content: I'll definitely take a closer look at the trunk's construction and see if I can find any maker's marks or labels. I'll also research trunk styles and designs from the 19th century to see if I can narrow down the time period it was made. Additionally, I'll explore the attic's history and look for any hidden compartments or secret spaces that might contain documents or other items related to the watch. Do you think I should also research the history of my grandfather's house and the attic itself to see if there are any connections to the watch or my great-great-grandfather's travels?
